The code HATRED shows  only  writes  a  0  at  an  already
zero-ed place on game init. Even if you  erase  that  code
the crack will still work. Our crack writes a  zero  to  a
wrong place where already a zero is. HATREDs crack  writes
a zero to where also a zero is. Therefor our  crack  works
100%  like  the  original,  which  makes  HATREDs   proper
INVALID! If you don't believe us, play with our crack till
the end of the game or debug it!
